features.name: Imageify
features.description: Full-stack web application that uses React, Node.js, and Firebase to allow users to login/register, and upload images to a public repository. Also allows users to delete, and update images they created, and search for particular images

features.name: Array Sorting Visualizer
features.description: React.js application that generates an array and visualizes the array by using bars of different heights. It then visualizes how the merge sorting algorithm works

features.name: React Weather App
features.description: A React.js application to retrieve weather information from a REST API and display data to the user using React state, background changes depending on the tempeture
